content: the mono pointy ribbed hat impresses with its sleek tapering shape and generously folded double brim which not only provides effective warmth but also gives the hat its distinctive silhouette the elastic ribbed pattern hugs the head comfortably while subtly incorporated pleats ensure a secure fit and lasting shape retention with its clean design and thoughtful craftsmanship it is a versatile companion that keeps you warm sits comfortably and proves itself in everyday wear the hat is worked top-down starting at the crown in all-over 1×1 rib using the magic loop method the upper half is shaped with increases then the body continues in 1×1 rib without further increases two brim folds are worked after a specified length size to fit head circumference s/m l 54 58 58 62 cm / 21 3 22 8 22 8 24 4 in materials 150 g 200 g alpakka ull by sandnes garn 50 g/100 m alternative 150 g 200 g peruvian highland wool by filcolana 50 g/100 m the gauge swatch has already been included in the yarn amount 8 stitch markers gauge 32 sts × 27 rnds = 10 × 10 cm 4 × 4 in in rib stitch k1 p1 after washing and blocking do not stretch the swatch while blocking the ribbing should look fairly snug so that the purl stitches are not visible needles 3 5 mm us 4 circular needle 60 cm / 24 in the sample is knitted in alpakka ull by sandnes garn shade 9873 the pattern also includes video tutorials for guidance
